title: Owner signs up and authenticates Snapshot

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Pool/spa maintenance logs with service provider + host signatures". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Offline capability (sign now, sync later)". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.
